html:
1.20.19  8:41 am   are people nice to you

     yes and no

1.20.19  7:02 am   You know what I never got? Why are there only 5 note lines in the staff when inevitably you'll be having some notes below the five lines (in thos small imaginary lines below) and sometimes you'll even have notes above the five lines. Why didn't they make it 7 lines so you get 2 more lines and 2 more spaces for a total of 4 more notes before you have to go above or below the lines? Hope you're following what my question is

     if i could guess i would say 7 lines is just too difficult to read quickly

1.20.19  6:20 am   why is bad music sometimes good, and why is good music sometimes bad? 

     it's all both

1.20.19  6:12 am   Is 'you're free to do whatever you want to' based on a real-life scenario?

     somewhat

1.20.19  5:41 am   Sometimes when playing my instrument, i play the same things over and over again. Im in a musical rut and everything sort of just bores me. How do i escape?

     try listening to something else, or watching something else

1.20.19  5:17 am   would you be willing to upload a zip file of all the screenshots you used to make a video? I just think it would be fascinating to trawl through, and I've never heard of anyone else working that way

     not all, but there will be a page on the site with that kind of material

1.20.19  4:41 am   you used a lot of planes in your last video, do you have any left? or did you use them all?​

     there's always more plane graphics, especially if you duplicate them. but i will probably not use them for a little while

1.20.19  4:00 am   Wouldn't it be so much more simple if we could just lie down and do nothing all day long?

     yes and boringly terrible

1.20.19  3:14 am   do you only answer questions that you personally deem interesting?

     no

1.20.19  2:09 am   Do you believe that anything is possible?

     it could be

1.20.19  2:09 am   A lot of the comments you get on your videos seem to be things like, "guys i found hidden meaning in this song etc.." but watching a lot of interviews you seem like you just kind of add stuff because they sound good or fit well. Is there a "hidden meaning" in these songs or is it all like just stuff that works?

     i am trying to make the content as powerfully good of an experience as i can. whether or not this meaning is hidden depends upon whether or not you have found it

1.20.19  2:00 am   do you prefer sunny days or cloudy/rainy days? or do you enjoy the unique qualities of each one?

     i like rain more and more

1.20.19  1:59 am   What's the meaning of "oh" in "la de da de da de da de day oh"?

     vowel shift

1.20.19  1:52 am   1.19.19  12:21 pm   Hey, I'm a professional physicist, and just so you know, this is a trap. Science actually becomes more useless the more fundamental you get, so a TOE would actually be the ultimate useless thing. There are many many things (in fact, the overwhelming majority of things in this world) that a TOE would not actually explain because no one outside of string theorists actually do science from first principles (deriving everything from quantum mechanics, etc). People just try to come up with models that fit their data. Please ask me if you need me to elaborate on any of this.

     can you email me, i have some questions for you about this and other things. billwurtz at billwurtz dot com. thanks!

1.20.19  1:20 am   Hi checking in. Wondering if you are doing okay. We don't really know a lot about you.  

     i know even less about you, which is confounded by the fact that you just claimed to be multiple people

     If you need something? How you spend your day?

     generally i spend time making content for billwurtz dot com and affiliated billwurtz channels

      I worry about people who live online but I guess we all do.

     i live on and offline, and i work mostly online. millions of people today do this

      I hope you never feel too alone or forced into this life. 

     i was forced into it by my great grandfather, who led this life just as his great grandfather before him

1.20.19  12:51 am   Your songs are awesome, but the lyrics seem so random. How do you come up with your ideas for them?

     by thinking about it together with the music

1.20.19  12:30 am   what time is it where you are?

     12:32 am

1.20.19  12:23 am   What key is Slow Down written in?

     F

1.19.19  11:59 pm   sometimes when im listening to slow down i feel like the rhythm reminds me of a clock running sound. was this intentional?

     no. maybe

1.19.19  11:28 pm   Outside of composing, do you ever just sit down to practice an instrument?

     no

      What instrument do you enjoy playing the most?

     that's impossible to calculate

1.19.19  11:03 pm   Are you doing any future interviews or podcasts?

     yes

1.19.19  10:47 pm   would you ever make a fully live action music video without animation?

     i've done that at least 4 times

1.19.19  10:45 pm   did you ever have singing lessons or are you just naturally gifted with singing abilities?

     neither

1.19.19  10:44 pm   Would you ever release your music on vinyl? It would sound great

     i might do it but i don't really want to

1.19.19  10:39 pm   Does all cereal come from a box or can you make your own

     you can make the box too

1.19.19  7:53 pm   MUSIC IS AWESOME!

     that may be true

1.19.19  7:44 pm   would you ever make a tv show, if given the opportunity?

     the tv is online now

1.19.19  7:41 pm   are the genius workers nice people

     yes

1.19.19  7:00 pm   if humans are 70% water, aren't we technically drowning?

     no

1.19.19  6:57 pm   was the line "now i'm going on a podcast to talk about my memories" in long long long journey related to h3 in any way

     accidentally i suppose

1.19.19  6:53 pm   Why does imovie suck so bad

     to encourage you to buy their more expensive product

1.19.19  6:44 pm   Do you have a schedule as to when your next song may be released?

     no but i wish i did

1.19.19  6:26 pm   How you get some inspiration to write your songs? (Sorry for the bad English. I'm not American/English/[type here a country who speak English])

     inspiration is everywhere. that's the golden rule

1.19.19  6:03 pm   I can relate to many of the notes in the notebook section. Are they random thoughts or the fruit of deep meditation? 

     maybe neither / both

1.19.19  5:50 pm   wondering if you ever struggled with bitter thoughts like "why are these less talented musicians more successful than me?" i hang around with lots of artsy types and it seems like a common complaint amongst them. Ever had those thoughts and how did you resolve them? 

     that is a very common thing to think, and i may have given into those thoughts earlier in life, but then i think i was able to get an electric shocking device which shocks me every time i have those thoughts. and now it's been many years since i've had a thought like that

1.19.19  5:25 pm   what is the life of meaning

     the one you and i have come to know and enjoy

1.19.19  4:32 pm   where is the aurport terminal

     should be at the junction of the land and the air

1.19.19  4:31 pm   are you ever going to livestream? maybe do an editing stream so we can see your creative process? 

     i would much rather do a swiftly edited version of the behind the scenes footage. then make a swiftly edited behind the scenes video about the behind the scenes video, etc

1.19.19  4:29 pm   can you make a song about dust?

     that might be over kill at this point

1.19.19  3:46 pm   is life cool

     yes, and hot

1.19.19  3:22 pm   hey bill just wondering if you've ever heard of my country Serbia? small country but we get a bad rep. will mean a lot to me if you've heard of it

     yes i have heard of it. i have actually mentioned it in a video before

1.19.19  3:02 pm   On this website, the videos on the videos page are 1136x640.

     639

      However, on YouTube, they're 1080p. Do you export two different versions? Is the YouTube version just upscaled from the 1136x640 version?

     i used to give youtube a mp4 version at 1920x1080, but nowadays i just give youtube the raw .mov, which is 1920x1080. the original res is 1920x1080

1.19.19  2:49 pm   bill I was supposed to go out with my friends tonight but I'm not going because it's raining and cold and I don't like clubs. How can I know whether this is how I really feel or this is just the deadly sin of sloth taking over me and thus I should push through it?
also do you like clubs?

     maybe there are some more important things you want to do

1.19.19  1:38 pm   Can I work for you?

     maybe

1.19.19  1:26 pm   i want to give you a lot of money, can i?

     sure

1.19.19  1:25 pm   help, ive heated porridge for the wrong amount of time

     oh you are scerwd

1.19.19  12:50 pm   I am going through a crisis, how do I stop the crisis help me

     write a book about the crisis and do a book tour

1.19.19  12:21 pm   what is one of your greatest desires and/or wishes

     find a TOE

1.19.19  10:11 am   What do I if someone killed me

     become a ghost and haunt them for years to come

1.19.19  9:09 am    Can you do an internet?

     sure
